newsitem.title: USA: Tesoro not part of KCS/Tenneco litigation.
newsitem.headline: Tesoro not part of KCS/Tenneco litigation.

text.p: Tesoro Petroleum Co said Monday it holds no interest in South Texas producing properties operated by a subsidiary of KCS Energy Inc, which has been the subject of litigation between KCS and Tennessee Gas Pipeline Co.
Early Monday, KCS said a jury awarded the Tenneco Inc subsidiary $143 million.
Saying it was responding to numerous inquiries, Tesoro said its producing interests in the Bob West Field are operated by Coastal Corp and Sanchez-O'Brien Oil and Gas Corp.
Tenneco Energy spokesman Russell Johnson said no companies were involved in this litigation except the Tenneco pipeline and KCS. -- New York Newsdesk 212-859-1610.
